title: "He'll run the country from jail like El Chapo."
description: The Russia story gets messier, Trump confirms the truth is dead, and Republicans try to take away health care from their voters. Then, new author Alyssa Mastromonaco joins Jon and Dan to reminisce, and Friends Like These host Ana Marie Cox stops by to talk health care.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
